Class UtilsForServer

java.lang.Object
UtilsForServer
class UtilsForServer extends Object
A class which contains most of all necessary methods for both Node.java and Sender.java.

  • Constructor Details

    • UtilsForServer

      UtilsForServer()

  • Method Details

    • getPort

      public static int getPort() throws IOException, InterruptedException
      A method which generates a random number between 8000 and 8079 as a port for the node to run on. This method also checks with the directory node class to see if the port is already taken.
      Returns:
      Returns a number between 8000 and 8079 if the port is available and -1 if it is taken.
      Throws:
      IOException
      InterruptedException

    • addNewNodeToServer

      public static void addNewNodeToServer(byte[] nodeInf) throws IOException
      A method which add a new node to the directory node.
      Parameters:
      nodeInf - The bytearray containing both the port number and the RSA public key.
      Throws:
      IOException

    • removeNodeFromServer

      public static void removeNodeFromServer(int portNumber) throws IOException
      A method which removes a given node from the directory node.
      Parameters:
      portNumber - The port number of the node to remove.
      Throws:
      IOException

    • getPublicKeys

      public static List<byte[]> getPublicKeys() throws IOException, InterruptedException
      A method which gets the public keys from the directory node.
      Returns:
      Returns a list of byte arrays containing the different public RSA keys. Each element of the list is a key.
      Throws:
      IOException
      InterruptedException

    • checkIfPortIsTaken

      public static boolean checkIfPortIsTaken(int portNumber) throws IOException, InterruptedException
      A method that checks to see if a given port is already taken. Only ports registered within the directory node are checked.
      Parameters:
      portNumber - The port number to check.
      Returns:
      Returns true if the port number is taken and false if no node have taken it.
      Throws:
      IOException
      InterruptedException

    • getByteArrayFromInputStream

      public static byte[] getByteArrayFromInputStream(InputStream inputStream) throws IOException
      A method which returns a bytearray from an input stream.
      Parameters:
      inputStream - The input stream you want the array from.
      Returns:
      Returns a bytearray made from the bytes read from the input stream.
      Throws:
      IOException

    • getFullByteArrayFromStream

      public static byte[] getFullByteArrayFromStream(InputStream inputStream) throws IOException, InterruptedException
      A method which returns the full byte array from the input stream.
      Parameters:
      inputStream - The input stream you want the array from.
      Returns:
      Returns a bytearray made from the bytes read from the input stream. This method sleeps for some time to make sure the whole stream is read.
      Throws:
      IOException
      InterruptedException

    • splitJSONArray

      public static ArrayList<String> splitJSONArray(String str)
      A method which splits a JSON array of strings.
      Parameters:
      str - The JSON array in the form of a string.
      Returns:
      Returns an arraylist of strings with each separate element from the JSON array.

    • splitJSONNodeArray

      public static ArrayList<NodeInfo> splitJSONNodeArray(String str)
      A method which splits the NodeInfo JSON object received from the directory node.
      Parameters:
      str - The string containing all the nodes from the server in JSON format.
      Returns:
      Returns an arraylist of node info objects made from the JSON object sent from the server.

    • generateSecretKey

      public static SecretKey generateSecretKey(int n) throws NoSuchAlgorithmException
      A method which generates a secret AES key by a given size.
      Parameters:
      n - The size of the AES key to generate.
      Returns:
      Returns a Secret key object of the AES key.
      Throws:
      NoSuchAlgorithmException

    • generateIv

      public static IvParameterSpec generateIv()
      A method which generates an IV.
      Returns:
      Returns the IV. The IV is 16 byte in size.

    • encodeWithBase64

      public static String encodeWithBase64(byte[] data)
      A method which encodes a byte array into a Base64 string.
      Parameters:
      data - The byte array to encode.
      Returns:
      Returns a string of the byte array after the Base64 encoding is done.

    • decodeWithBase64

      public static byte[] decodeWithBase64(byte[] data)
      A method which decodes a byte array on the form of base64.
      Parameters:
      data - The byte array to decode.
      Returns:
      Returns a byte array of the decoded array.

    • fuseTwoByteArrays

      public static byte[] fuseTwoByteArrays(byte[] arr1, byte[] arr2)
      A method to combine two byte arrays into one.
      Parameters:
      arr1 - The first array to combine.
      arr2 - The second array to combine.
      Returns:
      Returns a array made from the combination of arr1 and arr2. The new array will have arr1 first and then arr2.

    • encryptAndAddIv

      public static byte[] encryptAndAddIv(String algorithm, byte[] sendMessage, SecretKey secretKey, IvParameterSpec iv) throws InvalidAlgorithmParameterException, NoSuchPaddingException, IllegalBlockSizeException, NoSuchAlgorithmException, BadPaddingException, InvalidKeyException
      A method which encrypts a byte array and ands the IV used to the start of the new array.
      Parameters:
      algorithm - The crypto algorithm to be used.
      sendMessage - The array to be encrypted.
      secretKey - The secret key used for the encryption.
      iv - The IV for the encryption.
      Returns:
      Returns a new byte array of the encrypted array. The new array will also have the iv used added at the start.
      Throws:
      InvalidAlgorithmParameterException
      NoSuchPaddingException
      IllegalBlockSizeException
      NoSuchAlgorithmException
      BadPaddingException
      InvalidKeyException

    • decryptMessageContainingIV

      public static byte[] decryptMessageContainingIV(String algorithm, byte[] receivedMessage, SecretKey secretKey) throws InvalidAlgorithmParameterException, NoSuchPaddingException, IllegalBlockSizeException, NoSuchAlgorithmException, BadPaddingException, InvalidKeyException
      A method which decrypts a byte array with the IV at the start.
      Parameters:
      algorithm - The crypto algorithm to be used.
      receivedMessage - The array to be decrypted.
      secretKey - The secret key used for the decryption.
      Returns:
      Returns a new byte array of the decrypted array.
      Throws:
      InvalidAlgorithmParameterException
      NoSuchPaddingException
      IllegalBlockSizeException
      NoSuchAlgorithmException
      BadPaddingException
      InvalidKeyException

    • encrypt

      public static byte[] encrypt(String algorithm, byte[] input, SecretKey key, IvParameterSpec iv) throws NoSuchPaddingException, NoSuchAlgorithmException, InvalidAlgorithmParameterException, InvalidKeyException, BadPaddingException, IllegalBlockSizeException
      A method which encrypts an array.
      Parameters:
      algorithm - The crypto algorithm to be used.
      input - The array to be encrypted.
      key - The secret key used for the encryption.
      iv - The IV for the encryption.
      Returns:
      Returns the encrypted array after it has been base64 encrypted.
      Throws:
      NoSuchPaddingException
      NoSuchAlgorithmException
      InvalidAlgorithmParameterException
      InvalidKeyException
      BadPaddingException
      IllegalBlockSizeException

    • decrypt

      public static byte[] decrypt(String algorithm, byte[] cipherText, SecretKey key, IvParameterSpec iv) throws NoSuchPaddingException, NoSuchAlgorithmException, InvalidAlgorithmParameterException, InvalidKeyException, BadPaddingException, IllegalBlockSizeException
      A method which decrypts an array.
      Parameters:
      algorithm - The crypto algorithm to be used.
      cipherText - The array to be decrypted.
      key - The secret key used for the decryption.
      iv - The IV for the decryption.
      Returns:
      Returns the decrypted array after it has been base64 decrypted.
      Throws:
      NoSuchPaddingException
      NoSuchAlgorithmException
      InvalidAlgorithmParameterException
      InvalidKeyException
      BadPaddingException
      IllegalBlockSizeException

    • isMatch

      public static boolean isMatch(byte[] pattern, byte[] input, int pos)
      A method which checks a byte array to see if it contains a pattern.
      Parameters:
      pattern - The pattern to check for.
      input - The array to check.
      pos - The current position.
      Returns:
      Returns false if the pattern is not in the input and true if it is.

    • splitByteArray

      public static List<byte[]> splitByteArray(byte[] pattern, byte[] input)
      A method which splits a byte array on a pattern.
      Parameters:
      pattern - The pattern to split on.
      input - The array to split.
      Returns:
      Returns a list of byte arrays each being a part of the original array. Each element in the list is made after the original array was split.
